reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan to be of high quality, chic, and flattering, with soft, comfortable fabric that one customer compares to cashmere. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some find it amazing, others say it runs large. The dupe quality also gets mixed reviews, with customers appreciating it as a good dupe.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Warm and Perfect Fit
items.body: First of all this sweater does noes fit as pictured. The sweater has a looser fit but it does have a taper at the waist and I actually love the way it fitter better than I would if it was tighter. I am a small or an extra small and the sweater fits perfectly and true to size, though not as fitted as the photo. This sweater is soft and comfortable. I ordered the chocolate brown color and it is beautiful and as pictured. This sweater has washed well and has become e one of my favorites so I find it to be a great value for the money. 10/10. Read more
items.author: sailfishes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely piece
items.body: I purchased in two colors. Very soft. Fits as pictured. Nicely tailored. Read more
items.author: Natalie Hutt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Try it you might like it
items.body: Like the style. Lots of compliments. Brought in another color. True to size. Great fabric Read more
items.author: Dee

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dupe, except for the sleeves.
items.body: Nice dupe for a very expensive sweater. Pros: The sweater is super soft, true to size and extremely flattering. Cons: the sleeves are straight, not bell like the picture (which is from the original anyways) Still a great cardigan. Read more
items.author: Kristin R.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars The quality and color
items.body: I got it for the unique over size sleeves but when it came. the sleeves were just normal size. Read more
items.author: Alicia Richards

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and beautiful
items.body: My first color was navy in a large. I am keeping it but will buy another color in Medium. Two different looks but the quality is perfect. Would expect to pay double at any department store. Read more
items.author: Chrissy

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not as pictured
items.body: I was disappointed at the sweater. Was shaped more like a box did not cinch at waist. It is heavy materal and well made but not at all like it was pictured. Expensive for what it was. Side note ordered another size to see if maybe that was issue and all it did was make it a bigger box. Read more
items.author: LAK

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Dark Khaki, Apricot, Black, Camel, Orange, Red, Navy, Khaki, Pink, White, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
